name: Officer Baron's Afternoon Investigation!
description:
Made for DMI's 48 hour Bear Game Jam in 2017. The theme was "You can't outrun them..."

A visual novel adventure about a Bear!

Can you figure out who the culprit is?!

Credits:

Art/Code - Nolan Baker

Code/Writing/Level Design - John Hawley

Music:

Recording, Arrangement, Mixing, MasteringMade by Lobo Loco (Wolf Schweizer-Gerth) 2017
http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Lobo_Loco/Long__Relaxed/Ambient_Blues_Joe_ID_7...

Fonts:
https://www.dafont.com/kbballoonanimal.font
https://www.dafont.com/white-bear-lake.font

GitHub: https://github.com/jh318/BearJam-Visual-Novel
